attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app just completely destroyed my phone.. the programming left my phone glitching and getting hot flash warnings which led me to have to get a new phone. I didn’t have apple care so this app costed me a lot of money. do not recommend getting 🖐😺

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review:
This app😤is as if the coronavirus was an app🤮 Totally unreliable, unprofessional and a complete joke. SAD! 🤧
This app is super slow, lags and glitches every 2 minutes. I never received any updates from our glorious commander-in-chief😞

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: DO NOT get this app. i just got this phone and i started downloading apps and right when i got this app my phone got hacked and glitches so bad and it turned into a fire breathing dragon. that ate my mom. telling me to vote for the cheeto puff. and then my house got hacked and my toilet.

attributes.title: Summoned Confederate Ghosts in My Backyard
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and thought it’d be funny to prank all my liberal snowflake friends by sending them texts with screenshots. Went to bed and didn’t think anything of it....

That night I woke up to the smell of gun powder and the unmistakable sound of a late 19th century musket. I looked up, and there they were. 

Confederate ghosts in my bedroom. 

They’ve shown up every night since trying to register to vote (mail-in) using this wretched App. 

Send help.

attributes.title: Terrible App!
attributes.review: Do not download this app! It is very slow and freezes constantly. I couldn’t listen to music while using the app. It is a waste of time and energy. Do yourself a favor and do not download it!

attributes.title: Absolutely atrocious app, not worth the space!
attributes.review: I got the app in the mindset of, oh our “GREAT” president must have a great app, but then when i got on fortnite i wasnt goated on the spaghettios anymore so i got rid of it (now im goated on them again, now that i dont have this trash) not worth the space.

attributes.title: Don’t do it :(
attributes.review: After downloading this app Donald Trump showed up and pushed my grandma down the stairs then proceeded to light my house on fire he then stole my Nintendo Switch and Ate my guniea pigs got breakfast :( if you value your grandma your house it your guniea pigs you won’t download this app

attributes.title: Thanks but no❤️❤️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it’d be a lifesaver. Turns it the app basically drowned me. I’m not satisfied with my purchase and would like to throw it out and get my money (and a better president) back. Thanks and I highly DONT recommend😘😘

attributes.title: Trump u made a stupid app
attributes.review: It’s one of the worst apps i have ever used!!! extremely glitchy as well as stupid. why is their any need for a president to have an app? did obama? anyway, don’t download this piece of trash. total waste of time. gotta go walk my fish!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: He’s a horrible, racist man who wants to make America white again. This nation was BUILT on immigrants. Your ancestors were immigrants! He has no respect for anyone, especially not to women. Trump will not suppress Gen-Z. Trying to take down our app, let’s see how you like it.
